1: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> יָשַׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sat</n> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the king</n> בְּבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in his house</n> וַיהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> הֵנִֽיחַ־ <sup>5117 </sup> <n>had given him rest</n> ל֥וֹ מִסָּבִ֖יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>from all his enemies</n>
